name: PDFColorSpace
shortdesc: Options for specifying how to represent color information in the exported PDF.

property.name: RGB
property.shortdesc: Represents all color values using the RGB color space. Best suited for documents that will be viewed onscreen.

property.name: CMYK
property.shortdesc: Represents all color values using CYMK color space.

property.name: UNCHANGED_COLOR_SPACE
property.shortdesc: Leaves each image in its original color space.

property.name: GRAY
property.shortdesc: Converts all color values to high-quality black-and-white images. Gray levels of the converted objects represent the luminosity of the original objects.
